title: What Is Our True Identity? | Sri Chanchalapathi Dasa | SB 2.5.31 | 09.08.2024
speaker: HG Chanchalapathi Dasa

segments.text: Coming from Srimad Bhagavatam, 2nd Canto, 5th Chapter, entitled The Cause of All Causes, text number 31.
Jnana Shakti Kriya Shaktir Buddhiv Pranascha Taija Sav
Shrotram Tvagrana Drukjikva Vagdor Medra Angripayavaha
Shrotram Tvagrana Drukjikva Vagdor Medra Angripayavaha
Translation in purport by His Divine Grace A.C. Bhaktivedanta Swami Ishwara Prabhupada

By further transformation of the mode of passion, the sense organs, like the ears, skin, nose, eyes, tongue, mouth, hands, genitals, legs and the outlet for evacuating, together with intelligence and living energy, are all generated.
